trans-unit.source: Draws an image within a region defined by a <xref href="System.Windows.Rect"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 通过定义的区域中绘制图像<xref href="System.Windows.Rect"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: **Performance Note:** A <xref:System.Windows.Media.DrawingImage> provides less features then an <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Image> for rendering images, however, <xref:System.Windows.Media.DrawingImage> provides performance benefits making them ideal for describing backgrounds, clip art, and for low-level drawing with <xref:System.Windows.Media.Visual> objects.
trans-unit.target: **性能注意︰** A<xref:System.Windows.Media.DrawingImage>提供较少的功能则<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Image>对于呈现图像，但是，<xref:System.Windows.Media.DrawingImage>提供性能优势使其理想，描述背景，剪贴画，并与低级别的绘制<xref:System.Windows.Media.Visual>对象。</xref:System.Windows.Media.Visual> </xref:System.Windows.Media.DrawingImage> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Image> </xref:System.Windows.Media.DrawingImage>

trans-unit.source: See [Drawing Objects Overview](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md) for more information.
trans-unit.target: 请参阅[绘制对象概述](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)有关详细信息。

trans-unit.source: An ImageDrawing is a type of <xref:System.Windows.Freezable> object and therefore can be frozen to improve performance.
trans-unit.target: ImageDrawing 是一种<xref:System.Windows.Freezable>对象，因此可以冻结以提高性能。</xref:System.Windows.Freezable>

trans-unit.source: For information about <xref:System.Windows.Freezable> features, such as freezing and cloning, see the [Freezable Objects Overview](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: 璝惠<xref:System.Windows.Freezable>功能，如冻结和克隆，请参阅[可冻结对象概述](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)。</xref:System.Windows.Freezable>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Media.ImageDrawing"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新实例<xref href="System.Windows.Media.ImageDrawing"></xref>类。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Media.ImageDrawing"></xref> class that has the specified target <xref:System.Windows.Media.ImageDrawing.ImageSource*> and <xref:System.Windows.Media.ImageDrawing.Rect*>.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新实例<xref href="System.Windows.Media.ImageDrawing"></xref>具有指定的目标类<> *1> 和<> *1>。

trans-unit.source: Source of the image that is drawn.
trans-unit.target: 绘制图像的源。

trans-unit.source: Defines the rectangular area in which the image is drawn.
trans-unit.target: 定义在其中绘制图像的矩形区域。

trans-unit.source: Creates a modifiable clone of this <xref href="System.Windows.Media.ImageDrawing"></xref>, making deep copies of this object's values.
trans-unit.target: 创建的可修改复本<xref href="System.Windows.Media.ImageDrawing"> </xref>，从而深度复制此对象的值。

trans-unit.source: When copying dependency properties, this method copies resource references and data bindings (but they might no longer resolve) but not animations or their current values.
trans-unit.target: 在复制依赖项属性时，此方法会复制资源引用和数据绑定 （但可能不再解析），但不是动画或其当前值。

trans-unit.source: This method is used to produce modifiable copies of frozen <xref:System.Windows.Freezable> objects (or any <xref:System.Windows.Freezable> object).
trans-unit.target: 此方法用于生成的可修改副本冻结<xref:System.Windows.Freezable>对象 (或任何<xref:System.Windows.Freezable>对象)。</xref:System.Windows.Freezable> </xref:System.Windows.Freezable>

trans-unit.source: For convenience, this method shadows the inherited version with a strongly typed implementation.
trans-unit.target: 为方便起见，此方法将隐藏继承的强类型实现的版本。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see <xref:System.Windows.Freezable.Clone%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，请参阅<xref:System.Windows.Freezable.Clone%2A?displayProperty=fullName>。</xref:System.Windows.Freezable.Clone%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: A modifiable clone of the current object.
trans-unit.target: 当前对象的可修改复本。

trans-unit.source: The cloned object's <xref:System.Windows.Freezable.IsFrozen*> property will be <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref> even if the source's <xref:System.Windows.Freezable.IsFrozen*> property was <xref uid="langword_csharp_true." name="true." href=""></xref>
trans-unit.target: 克隆的对象<> *1> 属性将为<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>即使源的<> *1> 属性<xref uid="langword_csharp_true." name="true." href=""></xref>

trans-unit.source: Creates a modifiable clone of this <xref href="System.Windows.Media.ImageDrawing"></xref> object, making deep copies of this object's current values.
trans-unit.target: 创建的可修改复本<xref href="System.Windows.Media.ImageDrawing"></xref>对象，从而深度复制此对象的当前值。

trans-unit.source: Resource references, data bindings, and animations are not copied, but their current values are.
trans-unit.target: 不复制资源引用、 数据绑定和动画，而其当前值。

trans-unit.source: This method is used to produce modifiable copies of frozen <xref:System.Windows.Freezable> objects (or any <xref:System.Windows.Freezable> object).
trans-unit.target: 此方法用于生成的可修改副本冻结<xref:System.Windows.Freezable>对象 (或任何<xref:System.Windows.Freezable>对象)。</xref:System.Windows.Freezable> </xref:System.Windows.Freezable>

trans-unit.source: For convenience, this method shadows the inherited version with a strongly typed implementation.
trans-unit.target: 为方便起见，此方法将隐藏继承的强类型实现的版本。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see <xref:System.Windows.Freezable.CloneCurrentValue%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，请参阅<xref:System.Windows.Freezable.CloneCurrentValue%2A?displayProperty=fullName>。</xref:System.Windows.Freezable.CloneCurrentValue%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: A modifiable clone of the current object.
trans-unit.target: 当前对象的可修改复本。

trans-unit.source: The cloned object's <xref:System.Windows.Freezable.IsFrozen*> property will be <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref> even if the source's <xref:System.Windows.Freezable.IsFrozen*> property was <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 克隆的对象<> *1> 属性将为<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>即使源的<> *1> 属性<xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 要添加。

trans-unit.target: 获取或设置图像的源

trans-unit.source: The source of the image.
trans-unit.target: 图像的源。

trans-unit.source: The default value is **null**.
trans-unit.target: 默认值是**null**。

trans-unit.target: 标识<xref:System.Windows.Media.ImageDrawing.ImageSource*>依赖项属性。</xref:System.Windows.Media.ImageDrawing.ImageSource*>

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the region in which the image is drawn.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置在其中绘制图像的区域。

trans-unit.source: ## Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |Identifier Field|| |Metadata Flags||
trans-unit.target: # # 依赖项属性信息 | | | |-|-| |标识符字段 || |元数据标志 ||

trans-unit.source: The region in which the image is drawn.
trans-unit.target: 在其中绘制图像的区域。

trans-unit.source: The default is `Empty`.
trans-unit.target: 默认值是`Empty`。

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <xref:System.Windows.Media.ImageDrawing.Rect*> dependency property.
trans-unit.target: 标识<xref:System.Windows.Media.ImageDrawing.Rect*>依赖项属性。</xref:System.Windows.Media.ImageDrawing.Rect*>
